If the new schedule is inconvenient, you can either rebook to a different flight or request a full refund. Please let me know how you would like to proceed.
I'd like to rebook. Can I do it through you?
Absolutely! Please let me know your preferred date and time, and I will assist you with the rebooking process.
Thank you, I'll get back to you soon.
You're welcome! Feel free to reach out when you're ready. Have a great day!
